franchises.name: Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU)
franchises.overview: The Marvel Cinematic Universe is a sprawling superhero saga, weaving interconnected stories of iconic characters like Iron Man, Captain America, and the Avengers across multiple films, battling cosmic threats and personal struggles.

movies.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness

franchises.name: DC Extended Universe (DCEU)
franchises.overview: The DC Extended Universe brings gritty, epic tales of DC Comics heroes like Superman, Batman, and Wonder Woman, exploring their battles against villains and complex moral dilemmas in a shared cinematic world.

movies.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)

franchises.name: DC Universe (DCU)
franchises.overview: The DC Universe is a rebooted cinematic franchise, launching with Superman and expanding into bold, interconnected stories featuring heroes like The Authority and Batman in a fresh, unified vision.

franchises.name: Star Wars
franchises.overview: Star Wars is a legendary space opera franchise, chronicling the Skywalker saga and standalone adventures in a galaxy far, far away, filled with Jedi, Sith, and epic battles.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV – A New Hope
Star Wars: Episode V – The Empire Strikes Back
Star Wars: Episode VI – Return of the Jedi
Star Wars: Episode I – The Phantom Menace
Star Wars: Episode II – Attack of the Clones
Star Wars: Episode III – Revenge of the Sith
Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker

franchises.name: Aliens
franchises.overview: The Aliens franchise is a chilling sci-fi horror series, centered on humanity’s encounters with the deadly Xenomorphs, blending intense action and existential dread across spacefaring tales.

franchises.name: Harry Potter
franchises.overview: Harry Potter is a magical film series following the young wizard Harry and his friends as they battle dark forces at Hogwarts, exploring themes of friendship, courage, and destiny.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2

franchises.name: Lord of the Rings
franchises.overview: The Lord of the Rings is an epic fantasy saga, depicting the quest to destroy the One Ring and defeat Sauron, set in the richly crafted world of Middle-earth.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
